videoData.title: Megatrends -- 5 tips on the art and science of trend tracking
videoData.socialTitle: Megatrends -- 5 tips on the art and science of trend tracking

nodes.whoTheyAre: Through her role in BCG’s Center for Sensing & Mining the Future, Alison Sander tracks megatrends to help clients find their next areas of growth. She earned an MBA from Harvard Business School, a JD from Harvard Law School and a BA in political science with high honors from the University of Chicago. Sander is a member of The Council on Foreign Relations, a Board member of the World Resources Institute, an Overseer of the Museum of Science and a founder of AltWheels.

videoData.description: What's next? It's the question we never stop asking, with new answers emerging every day from trends and data that offer tantalizing clues for the discriminating observer. For example: pets now outnumber children in the USA, Europe and Japan. What product lines may emerge from this shift? Doggy Prozac? Megatrend expert Alison Sander explains how you can spot growing trends and gives five tips on how you can use trends to your advantage.
